title: etnies PAS House for Public Domaine La Gaite Lyrique
description: Imagine a city of the future where skateboards are used as the primary form of transportation and recreation – in and out of your home. A utopia city for skateboarders would mean that a skateable path, like a ribbon connecting everything together, links each building in an unending ability to keep in motion on your board. The PAS House takes this concept and brings it to life through an architectural project mixing a modern single family home with a skateboard ramp structure – all from an environmentally-driven perspective.
tags: etnies,skateboarding,Pierre-Andre Senizergues,25th anniversary,Next 25,Public Domaine,La Gaite,Paris,Jose Rojo,Kyle Leeper
